item.title: Economic Woes Drive Rural Telegraphy Initiative
item.description:
The recent economic downturn has forced a reevaluation of strategies for providing digital communication to rural communities. Access to the internet and even cell phone service is notoriously limited in these areas. While the Rural Broadband Initiative, part of the economic stimulus plan, aimed to address this issue by funding fiber optic cable installation, those funds have unfortunately been redirected. Robb M. Blihnd, a hedge fund manager, explained that the funds were considered more essential for urban and suburban areas...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/economic-woes-drive-rural-telegraphy-initiative/
